title: BRIEF-Redflow Says Won Order From South African Telecom Co To Provide 68 Zbm2 Zinc-Bromine Flow Batteries
text:
BRIEF-Redflow Says Won Order From South African Telecom Co To Provide 68 Zbm2 Zinc-Bromine Flow Batteries

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Redflow Says Won Order From South African Telecom Co To Provide 68 Zbm2 Zinc-Bromine Flow Batteries Sept 18 (Reuters) - Redflow Ltd : * WON AN ORDER TO PROVIDE 68 ZBM2 ZINC-BROMINE FLOW BATTERIES FOR AT LEAST 20 MOBILE PHONE TOWER SITES IN SOUTH AFRICA * NEW ORDER FOR ZBM2 BATTERIES IS THROUGH REDFLOW'S SOUTH AFRICAN PARTNER MOBAX

BRIEF-Redflow Says Won Order From South African Telecom Co To Provide 68 Zbm2 Zinc-Bromine Flow Batteries
description: BRIEF-Redflow Says Won Order From South African Telecom Co To Provide 68 Zbm2 Zinc-Bromine Flow Batteries
